description: Expanded scope to Full Stack SDE 2, owning the Referral Programme, contributing to the Payment Contracts team, and spearheading system optimization
Engineered backend services using Python, Golang, and Kafka consumers for real-time data processing while integrating OpenAI SDK for AI features
Leading frontend development for innovative products on the HyperEVM blockchain
Led the frontend integration of secure blockchain functionalities using Wagmi and collaborated with UI/UX designers to translate prototypes into responsive web interfaces
Delivered over 20+ responsive web applications by collaborating with designers and backend developers using React, Next.js, and TypeScript
